technology.FLAT: A roof covered with bituminous or concrete materials. It is usually horizontal and flat.
technology.PITCHED: A roof covered with ceramic or tin tiles. Usually it is sloping

edit.description: You can add the building owner details later on, before applying for a guarantee.

guaranteeSubmitAlert.title: You cannot submit for a guarantee yet

confirm.title: Are you sure?
confirm.description: You are about to approve a solution guarantee request. The guarantee documentation will now be generated and automatically issued to the building owner by email. The installer will be notified but you can also add a note to this project.

reject.title: Are you sure?
reject.description: You are about to reject a solution guarantee request. The installer will be notified. Add a note to this project to confirm to the installer what is required.

defaultDialog.description: A certificate for your guarantee will be available to view on the Projects page.
defaultDialog.title: Your guarantee has been processed

solutionDialog.description: Complete your application by submitting evidence on the uploads tab.
solutionDialog.title: Guarantee application started

selectGuarantee.message: Guarantees are not available for this type of roof.  Please contact your local BMI Administrator for more information.
selectGuarantee.title: There is no guarantee type available for their technology

message.guarantee_exists_error: You cannot have a Solution or System Guarantee for a project that already has a Product Guarantee
message.not_available_tier: This guarantee type is not available in your Tier

alert_banner.description: Once the guarantee has been approved, the building owner will receive the guarantee documentation automatically, to the email address provided.
alert_banner.title: Need to know

required.title: Please complete your application by providing the following:

responsible_installer.description: Please select an installer from the Project Team who is acting as the Responsible Installer. They should hold a certificate in the same technology as the Project that you want to guarantee.
responsible_installer.title: A responsible installer

step2.subTitle: Select the preferred language for the guarantee documentation

step3.product_subTitle: Select the Product for the guarantee documentation
step3.solution_subTitle: Select the System for the guarantee documentation
step3.system_subTitle: Select the System for the guarantee documentation

step4.subTitle: Please upload a copy of the receipt for the product(s) you would like to guarantee
step4.title: Receipt details

step5.subTitle: Please review the information that you have provided, before submitting your application.
step5.title: Review

guaranteeRestart.note: The guarantee associated with this project has been restarted, so a new guarantee can be requested

confirm.title: Restart Guarantee?
confirm.description: Restarting a guarantee will permanently remove the guarantee from a project, so a new guarantee can be requested. Any team members and uploaded files added to the project will be retained.

copyDialog.content: Would you like to copy this project (project details and building owner details) to create a new one?
copyDialog.title: Copy this project
